question:
If \(f(x) = x^2\), which of the following is equal to \(f(m + n) + f(m - n)\)?
(A) \(m^2 + n^2\)
(B) \(m^2 - n^2\)
(C) \(2m^2 + 2n^2\)
(D) \(2m^2 - 2n^2\)
(E) \(m^2n^2\)
